children.description: Content rendered inside the group (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the group

headingLevel.description: Sets the heading level to use for the group title. Default is h1.

isExpanded.description: Adds styling to the group to indicate expanded state

isRead.description: Adds styling to the group to indicate whether it has been read

onExpand.description: Callback for when group button is clicked to expand (Function: (event: any, value: boolean) => void)
onExpand.default: (event: any, expanded: boolean) => undefined as any

title.description: Notification drawer group title (React component or element)

tooltipPosition.description:
Position of the tooltip which is displayed if text is truncated (Type: | TooltipPosition
| 'auto'
| 'top'
| 'bottom'
| 'left'
| 'right'
| 'top-start'
| 'top-end'
| 'bottom-start'
| 'bottom-end'
| 'left-start'
| 'left-end'
| 'right-start'
| 'right-end')

truncateTitle.description: Truncate title to number of lines
